java.info: This Java version is not supported:
common.statistics.title: Statistics:
animal_master.questions1: 1. Which animal is the biggest of all that have ever lived?
animal_master.questions3: 3. Which animal is able to fly and has feathers?
animal_master.questions4: 4. Which animal is known for a black and white skin?
animal_master.questions5: 5. Which animal has gotten a long proboscis?
animal_master.questions6: 6. Which animal is able to swim the fastest?
animal_master.questions7: 7. Which animal is able to run the fastest?
animal_master.questions8: 8. Which animal is the heaviest animal which has ever lived?
animal_master.questions9: 9. Which animal is the most poisoning animal?
animal_master.questions10: 10. Which insect is the most dangerous animal?
animal_master.questions11: 11. Which animal has gotten the most limbs?
animal_master.questions12: 12. Which animal has the longest life expectancy?
animal_master.questions13: 13. Which animal has the shortest life expectancy?
animal_master.komplinemte1: Correct! You are smart like a fox!
animal_master.komplinemte2: Great! You have the knowledge of a genius!
animal_master.komplinemte3: Excellent! Your mind is razor sharp!
animal_master.komplinemte4: Brilliant! You have the talent of a professional!
animal_master.komplinemte5: Genius! You are a true miracle!
animal_master.komplinemte6: Great done! You are really clever!
animal_master.komplinemte7: Super! You are a true natural talent!
animal_master.komplinemte9: Top! You can do it like no other!
animal_master.komplinemte10: Terrific! You are a true intelligence beast!
animal_master.beleidigungen1: Wrong! You idiot, that was way too easy!
animal_master.beleidigungen2: You can't be serious! It really wasn't that difficult!
animal_master.beleidigungen4: Oh man, you're really slow on the uptake!
animal_master.beleidigungen5: That was pathetic. Better try again!
animal_master.beleidigungen6: How can you possibly do this wrong? Unbelievable!
animal_master.beleidigungen8: My goldfish would have done better!
animal_master.beleidigungen10: You'd better give up on the quiz.
animal_master.resultate.0: You were not able to answer one single question correctly!
animal_master.resultate.3: You almost got half of it right!
animal_master.resultate.4: You got half of it right!
animal_master.resultate.5: Well done, you got one more than half right!
animal_master.resultate.6: Well done, just two more right and it would be perfect!
animal_master.resultate.7: Well done, just one more right and it would be perfect!
animal_master.resultate.8: Perfect! You did everything right! Congratulations!
animal_master.resultate.hard0: After all, you answered all the normal questions correctly!
animal_master.resultate.hard1: Well done, you were able to answer another question correctly!
animal_master.resultate.hard2: Well done, you got two more questions right!
animal_master.resultate.hard3: Well done, you got half of the difficult questions right!
animal_master.resultate.hard4: Well done, just one more right and everything would be right!
animal_master.resultate.hard5: Perfect! You did everything right! Congratulations!
animal_master.next.question: Next Question
detective_eagle.erklärung: Press start and look closely at the picture!
detective_eagle.question2: 2. What color hair did the thief have?
detective_thunder.description.line2: You have to solve a theft case. To do this, you have to make intelligent decisions.
detective_thunder.description.line3: (Future) At the bottom right there is a cell phone in which evidence and suspects can be found.
pixel_quest.save.error.wrong_version:
This save is made for a newer or older version. 
Unable to load game. 
Saved version: %s, Version of this PixelQuest version: %s
pixel_quest.save.for_older: This save was created for an older version of PixelQuest.
pixel_quest.tooltip.smelt!: You can cook this item to get a better food.
pixel_quest.tooltip.attack_with!: Select this item to do more damage.
pixel_quest.set_keybind: Press any key to set the binding for
sound.detective_thunder.001.wav: Good day Detective Thunder, today you have to solve a theft-case. A painting was supposed to be exhibited in the art gallery tomorrow, but it disappeared during the night.
sound.detective_thunder.002.wav: Good day Magritte, did you notice anything of the theft-case?
sound.detective_thunder.003.wav: Yes I heard a noise at two o'clock. I use security cameras but I didn't see anyone in any of the pictures. The painting was in a display case. I haven't touched the display case since the incident.
sound.detective_thunder.004.wav: That means fingerprints could still be on the display case.
sound.detective_thunder.005.wav: Detective Thunder, how could these informations be enough? Huh? Because of this I have to hire another detective. You did not complete this case.
sound.detective_thunder.007.wav: You lost because of a wrong accusation!
